import java.io.*;
import java.util.*;
import java.math.*;
import java.text.*;
public class Main {
public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
	BufferedReader in;
	StringBuilder out = new StringBuilder();
	File file = new File("in");
	if (file.exists())
		in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(file));
	else
		in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
	String line, lines[];
	int nCases = Integer.parseInt(in.readLine());
	long B, N;
	long mod2, v2;
	BigInteger mod2B, v2B;
	for ( int nC = 0; nC < nCases; nC++ )
	{
		lines = in.readLine().split(" ");
		N = Long.parseLong(lines[0]);
		B = Long.parseLong(lines[1]);
		mod2B = new BigInteger(B+"");
		mod2B = mod2B.multiply(new BigInteger("2"));
		v2B = new BigInteger("1");
		for ( long i = 1l; i <= N; i++ )
		{
			v2B= v2B.multiply(new BigInteger(i+""));
			v2B = v2B.mod(mod2B);
		}
		if ( Long.parseLong(v2B.toString()) < B) out.append("Even\n");
		else out.append("Odd\n");
	}
	System.out.print(out);
}
}
